mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_file_app ( file_code, app_code, module_code, file_history, column_1, column_2, column_3 ) VALUES ( #{file_code}, #{app_code}, #{module_code}, #{file_history}, #{column_1}, #{column_2}, #{column_3} )

INSERT INTO sys_file_app ( file_code, app_code, module_code, file_history, column_1, column_2, column_3 ) VALUES
( #{item.file_code}, #{item.app_code}, #{item.module_code}, #{item.file_history}, #{item.column_1}, #{item.column_2}, #{item.column_3} )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.file_code, t1.app_code, t1.module_code, t1.file_history, t1.column_1, t1.column_2, t1.column_3 FROM sys_file_app t1 WHERE t1.file_code = #{file_code} AND t1.app_code = #{app_code} AND t1.module_code = #{module_code}
